title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Units sold, with a total of 11 data points.
Overall Units sold has increased over the Year
Units sold is gradually constant from 2009 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
Max Units sold about 75506.0 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Units sold about 41808.0 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Units sold, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2011 to 2012.
